p: Sprague–Dawley (SD) male rats (Certificate NO. 181 1164, 200 ± 20 g) were provided by the experimental animal center of Hebei Medical University. All animal experiments followed the guidelines of the experimental animal management committee of Hebei Medical University. The rats were housed under standard conditions (temperature, 22–24 °C, relative humidity, 45–55%, and light, 12 h dark 12 light cycles) for 5 d prior to use, and fasted 12 h before experiment, but free to water.
